thread.title: Broncos draft prospect tracker: Who are they meeting with?
thread.title_full: Broncos draft prospect tracker: Who are they meeting with?

author: Cameron Wolfe
title: Broncos draft prospect tracker: Who are they meeting with?
text:
Broncos draft prospect tracker: Who are they meeting with? All teams are allowed up to 60 formal 15-minute interviews with prospects at the NFL Combine Share this: By Cameron Wolfe | | The Denver Post PUBLISHED: March 2, 2017 at 3:41 pm | UPDATED: March 2, 2017 at 4:20 pm Highlights Judge: Casey Anthony may have accidentally killed daughter 
INDIANAPOLIS — Prospects confirmed they will or have met with the Broncos at the NFL Combine, plus any comments they made to The Denver Post about the meeting or team. All teams are allowed up to 60 formal 15-minute interviews with prospects at the NFL Combine. Had formal meeting 
Christian McCaffrey, RB, Stanford, MET Wednesday night: “That’d be awesome. That’d be great. I’d love to play there.” 
Dalvin Cook, RB, Florida State, MET Wednesday night. “Great meeting. We got everything sealed away. We watched a lot of tape. It was a great meeting.” 
Alvin Kamara, RB, Tennessee, MET. Related Articles 
Kareem Hunt, RB, Toledo , MET. 
Brian Hill, RB, Wyoming, MET. 
D’onta Foreman, RB, Texas , MET. 
Samaje Perine, RB, Oklahoma , MET. 
Ryan Ramczyk, OT, Wisconsin, MET. “We had a good meeting. They asked a lot of questions. Obviously, I hope they liked what I had to say and how I play as a player.” 
Dan Feeney, OG, Indiana , MET. Plan to meet 
Cam Robinson, OT/OG, Alabama , PLAN TO MEET Thursday night. 
Garett Bolles, OT, Utah , PLAN TO MEET Thursday night: “I love Colorado. I have a heart there because those are the people I taught on my (LDS) mission so if I end up going there I’d do just fine.” 
Issac Isiata, OG, Utah , PLAN TO MEET Thursday night: “I’m excited about that one.” 
Zach Banner, OT, USC , PLAN TO MEET Thursday night. Tags: Players’ union tells NFL competition committee to ban leaping on field goals March 02, 2017, 10:38 am Representatives of the NFL Players Association told the league’s competition committee here Wednesday that there should be a ban on defensive players leaping over the line of scrimmage to attempt to block field goal attempts or extra points. Johnny Manziel re-signs with agent who dumped him after promising to change March 02, 2017, 10:24 am A little more than one year after Johnny Manziel got dumped by agent Erik Burkhardt, the two seemed to have patched things up as the former Browns quarterback attempts an NFL comeback. John Elway says he’s happy with Broncos’ two young QBs but is “open to everything” March 02, 2017, 10:21 am John Elway reiterated his faith in quarterbacks Trevor Siemian and Paxton Lynch but said the Broncos will consider all options when free agency begins next week. John Elway optimistic about his own contract talks with Broncos March 02, 2017, 7:48 am While Broncos general manager John Elway is hoping to make his own free agent splashes, he has his own contract situation that needs to me addressed. Elway was upbeat and positive Wednesday when discussing whether he’ll remain in his current role beyond 2017.
